topic.title: I HATE THEM, KILL THEM ALL!
topic.body: Yes! YES! They are the negative expletive of the random geographical object! They have been random historical factoid for such a long time, that we are really justified to list of things we don't have any clue about!!!

1_14QD2BAZenH8vwW6JrFsFj337KL2KERH3v.body:
I completely agree!!!! DEATH TO THEM! 
â€¦what's a kike?

1_1Ea3RG4YuLnifynBxvuWAA3Y2nLcTWfrjQ.body: Are you ugly and bald? That's almost a requirement. Blonde AND bald, that's aryan minimum.
